statements: UPDATE required_minimum_distributions SET distribution_amount = 1500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE required_minimum_distributions SET retirement_account_type = '401k', age = 65 WHERE account_holder_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE required_minimum_distributions SET distribution_amount = 5000 WHERE account_holder_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE required_minimum_distributions SET retirement_account_type = '401(k)', age = 70 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE retirement_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance - 500 WHERE ra_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE distribution_calculations SET required_min_distribution = 2000, calculation_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE ra_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE retirement_accounts SET account_balance = account_balance - 500, age = age + 1 WHERE ra_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE distribution_calculations SET required_min_distribution = required_min_distribution * 1.1, calculation_date = NOW() WHERE ra_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE retirement_account SET account_balance = 5000.00 WHERE account_owner = 'John Doe' AND account_age < 60;
UPDATE distribution_events SET distribution_amount = 1000.00, event_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE account_id = 101 AND event_id = 5;
UPDATE retirement_account SET account_balance = account_balance + 500 WHERE account_id = 100;
UPDATE distribution_events SET distribution_amount = 500.75, event_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE account_id = 200;
UPDATE account_holders SET birthdate='1990-05-20' WHERE account_holder_id=1;
UPDATE retirement_accounts SET account_balance=15000.50, open_date='2022-01-15' WHERE account_id=101;
UPDATE account_holders SET birthdate = '1985-06-15', name = 'John Doe' WHERE account_holder_id = 12345;
UPDATE retirement_accounts SET account_balance = 15000.50, open_date = '2022-01-30' WHERE account_holder_id = 12345;
UPDATE required_min_distributions SET age = 30, distribution_amount = 1500 WHERE account_id = 1001;
UPDATE account_owners SET account_id = 1002 WHERE owner_id = 2001;
UPDATE required_min_distributions SET distribution_amount = 1500.50 WHERE account_id = 1001;
UPDATE distribution_history SET amount_distributed = 5000.75, distribution_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE distribution_id = 2003;
